body.name: Gina's Soft Cloth Shop 1 Ply Organic Flannel Washable Baby Wipes 8 x 8 Inches Set of 10 Earthtone Assortment

features: Wash and reuse, will last for years!
body.description: Stack of 10 eco-friendly alternative to paper towels, napkins, and throw away baby wipes. This is a great way to help eliminate trash, and an easy way to help the environment. These are made from Super Soft 1 layer of GOTS Certified 100% Organic Cotton Flannel,very soft polyester thread and measure 8x8 inches. The Little Wipes are perfect for little hands, but are thirsty enough to dry big hands, too. Great for casual, every day napkins (and they won't fall apart like paper napkins do). Nice and gentle enough for baby's face or behind; and, a great thing to keep in your purse for messy emergencies when you are on the road. You can expect these work-horses to last for a very long time. Use them to mop up any spill, dry your hands, or for any typical use of paper towels. I throw mine in the washer and dryer with any and all loads of laundry (they take up very little space), because no special care is required. Unbleached Organic is softer than the white or printed flannel, lasts longer, and is better for the environment. Natural, unbleached flannel fabric is from a certified Fair Trade Factory, and cut, sewn and finished here in the USA by Americans. This set is in stock, and ready to go. Try them and love them, or send them back for a 100% refund.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #7,956 in Handmade Products (See Top 100 in Handmade Products) #4 in Handmade Bath Linen #202 in Bath Washcloths

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Waited to post & love them still
reviews.reviewText: Loved these off the bat and still do. We folded them in threes and put them in a regular napkin holder. They are SOO soft and held up for multiple washes. Guests have asked me about them because they also loved them. I have two small children and they didnt blink an eye when I showed them to throw them in the laundry basket (2&6) . We purchased a small hanging laundry basket and hooked it on the side of our recyling bin. Adds so much to our country vibe & love that were being eco friendly while saving $ on napkins

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect, Soft, Wonderful!
reviews.reviewText: These are everything you need - look no further! High praise for a cloth but I’m serious. Soft. The perfect size, pretty and they work incredibly well. I use these on my face everyday and can’t wait to keep using them for years!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t seem soft or absorbent to me.
reviews.reviewText: My sterling ware manufacturer advises cleaning with flannel cloth, so I tried this product. Don’t notice it being soft or absorbent. I doesn’t seem to leave any scratches on the sterling ware, which was the purported concern about other cleaning cloths. Can’t tell if it is worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I expected!
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Happy with the quality and that it is dye free and organic. Using as napkins and for castor oil packs. Happy that it is a small American owned business too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great face cloths
reviews.reviewText: I make my own witch hazel face cleaning wipes and these are great for that use case. I keep them in a small airtight bin with the solution and use them and then launder them. Super soft. Comes clean easily in the wash.Ended up having to use a couple to clean out my dog's ear and they got perfectly clean after rinsing and then laundering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love these organic flannel washcloths. I can see multiple uses for them. Also received a gift from seller. Thank you! Minimal packaging, which I appreciate. Perfect buy, I couldn’t be more pleased with my purchase. Super soft, great quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for castor oil pack liniing
reviews.reviewText: I use these with castor oil with an outer soft pack with elastic. These hold the oil very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not quite what I was looking for.
reviews.reviewText: These are soft, very thin flannels that would make great alternatives to baby wipes. I personally just wanted some smaller spit cloths to tuck into my baby's shirt when they feed from the bottle. They don't absorb great and get very wrinkly/ shrink in the wash. I'm not sure how long they're going to last us.
